text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Sudden rise in coronavirus cases is hitting rural states without stay-at-home orders:

📈Oklahoma - 53% increase in cases over the past week. 📈Arkansas - 60%  increase
📈Nebraska - 74% increase
📈Iowa - 82% increase
📈South Dakota - a whopping 205% spike
https://t.co/iIKiUu2k81
